alert.note: Alert for Atlantic Coastal Cape May (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 18 at 3:16AM EDT until April 19 at 1:00AM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 AM EDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...East winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In New Jersey, Atlantic Coastal Cape May. In Delaware, Kent, Inland Sussex and Delaware Beaches. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 1 AM EDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
